WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Please log separate tickets for disparate issues, otherwise it's difficult to track and you can't name your ticket with something others can search for and vote on.

1. You'll need to provide more details here. It's certainly working in the general case. For all projects? A particular project? VS2012/2013? Etc.

2. This is a duplicate of https://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/2215

3. Please log a separate suggestion so that other users can upvote. This would certainly be nice to have, it's something we've talked about before.
